cleaned_text: Image 1 of 2 Image 2 of 2 Couples Herbal Clearing Ritual $354.00 A time outside of time, with your beloved, to open, let go, and set a fresh intention. This ritual session uses the grounding beauty of nature to bring you into presence together. In this session you will discover the healing herbs of Big Sur, a clearing and calling-in ritual, guided herbal bodywork session and sound healing journey to ground your intentions into embodiment. 120min Sessions are offered at the beautiful hot spring bathhouse of the Esalen Institute, perched on sacred ocean cliffs and healing mineral waters. To book a healing arts day pass or retreat contact Esalen Institute directly through the link below and request the Couples Herbal Clearing Ritual.
